entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
